metadata.title: USN-5288-1 -- Expat vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Expat incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5288-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  lib64expat1-dev - 2.1.0-4ubuntu1.4+esm4 expat - 2.1.0-4ubuntu1.4+esm4 libexpat1-dev - 2.1.0-4ubuntu1.4+esm4 libexpat1 - 2.1.0-4ubuntu1.4+esm4 lib64expat1 - 2.1.0-4ubuntu1.4+esm4 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
